content.p: The School of Sociology and Social Policy has a strong and vibrant community of postgraduate research students. We are dedicated to developing our students' research skills, expertise and careers, in a supportive and collegial environment. We encourage all of our research students to get involved with the school's research centres. We are also home to ENQUIRE - a blog and conference run by our students, which provides an encouraging space for postgraduate research from the UK and worldwide. Our guide to applying Funding information Our PhDs enable you to explore the sociological landscape by conducting original research on a variety of significant social, policy, and political issues. With this DPP, you can combine courses on public policy and research methods with a substantial piece of doctoral-level research. Discover campus life with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Experience student life by exploring areas such as accommodation, student services, sport centres, libraries and the Researcher Academy.
